pages.text: 巧妇难为无米之炊 - ingredients gathering is just as important as cooking itself.$(br2)Most crops added by Cuisine may be found in the wild with $(em)approporaite climate$(). Crops such as wheat, peanuts, sesame and soybean may drop from breaking vanilla grass.$(br2)A certain ingredients may only be found in $(em)trades with villagers$().
